page.title: 13CLUBS IN THE SHREWLEY AREA
page.content:
In the Shrewley area itself there are not many clubs although there is a Parish Church and Youth Centre. There are however groups of Guides, Scouts, Brownies and Cubs in Hatton which meet in the Church Parish Room. There are also three Women Institutes. Their meetings are held once every month.
Some women go to a womens club. Some people go to squash and swimming clubs. These people have to travel to to do these hobbies.
One man is the Chairman of the Vintage Tractor and Machinery Society. He collects,repairs and restores old tractors which he keeps on his farm. This society does a lot of Charity work. There is one political group called the Conservative Association.
